author: Al Jazeera
title: ‘Not peacekeepers at all’: UN chief condemns Russia move: Live
description: UN chief calls for immediate ceasefire as Western countries impose sanctions on Moscow over Ukraine crisis.
content: UN chief Antonio Guterres has dismissed Russias plans to send troops to eastern Ukraine as not peacekeepers at all, as Western nations imposed stinging sanctions against Moscow, including measures th… [+2733 chars]
